meanings.sent1: I enjoy snacking on apples in the afternoon.
meanings.sent2: She was snacking on popcorn while watching a movie.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was caught snacking on the bird feeder again!
meanings.sent4: The waves snacking on the sandy beach reminded me of a hungry giant.
meanings.sent5: The sound of snacking echoed through the quiet room.

meanings.definition: A small amount of food eaten between meals.
meanings.sent1: My favorite snacking option is carrot sticks.
meanings.sent2: The kids always have a variety of snacks for snacking at school.
meanings.sent3: The snacking at the party was so delicious, I couldn't stop!
meanings.sent4: The snacking on the picnic blanket looked like a colorful mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The snacking on the hiking trail made the adventure even more enjoyable.
